summary.span: Represents a control that displays an image.

span.span: Represents a control that displays an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您載入下列影像類型：.bmp、.gif、.ico、.jpg、.png、.wdp 和.tiff。The class enables you to load the following image types: .bmp, .gif, .ico, .jpg, .png, .wdp, and .tiff. 當顯示畫格映像時，會顯示第一個畫面格。When displaying a multiframe image, only the first frame is displayed. 不支援多格影像的動畫控制項。The animation of multiframe images is not supported by the control. 已載入的映像內容，直到和的控制項將會報告為零，因為映像內容用來判斷最終大小，以及控制項的位置。Until the image content is loaded, the and of the control will report as zero, because the image content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 固定的大小的控制項，及/或可以設定屬性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 不過，若要保留媒體的長寬比，設定或屬性，但非兩者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

permission.span: 顯示您不需要的映像或存取。

span.span: for displaying images that you don't have or access for.
Associated enumeration: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是，它便無法載入，因為已損毀的標頭，而兩者和發生事件。If the is a and it fails to load, due to a corrupt header, both the and events occur. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage \<*object* ImageFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* ImageFailed="*EventHandler*" .../> ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|受限於 , constrained by |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果符合條件約束可將映像一定會傳回其自然的大小。The image will always return its natural size, if it fits within the constraint. 如果沒有，它會傳回大可能大小。If not, it will return as large a size as it can.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how an should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how an should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為會導致您要延伸到完全填滿輸出區域的映像。A value of will cause your image to stretch to completely fill the output area. 當輸出區域和影像的外觀比例不相同時，影像就會因為自動縮放而扭曲。When the output area and the image have different aspect ratios, the image is distorted by this stretching. 若要讓保留外觀比例的影像，將此屬性設定為（預設值） 或。To make an preserve the aspect ratio of the image, set this property to (default) or . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use this property. [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample_snip#ImageSimpleExampleInlineCode2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample_snip/CSharp/ImageSimpleExample.xaml.cs#imagesimpleexampleinlinecode2)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample_snip#ImageSimpleExampleInlineCode2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample_snip/VB/ImageSimpleExample.xaml.vb#imagesimpleexampleinlinecode2)]
